CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Instruction - Mansfield E. Cole explaines one of his insurance policies as his wife, Mrs. Madelyn Cole, right, and his secretary, Mrs. Elizabeth Smith, left, distribute literature. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Elizabeth Smith, Mansfield E. Cole, and Madelyn Cole, gathered in the Mansfield E. Cole Insurance Agency booth in the Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
